workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Manage PDBs in Oracle Database 23ai from Oracle Enterprise Manager (EM)

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The workshop on PDB management and administration in Oracle Database using Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (EM).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Access the NoVNC Remote Desktop
tutorials.description: How to set up a NoVNC remote desktop connection to the compute instance provisioned using Oracle resources

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Provision a Pluggable Database (PDB)
tutorials.description: How to provision PDBs in a CDB using Oracle Enterprise Manager.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Remove PDBs from CDB
tutorials.description: How to remove PDBs from a CDB using Oracle Enterprise Manager.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Plug PDBs into CDB
tutorials.description: How to plug an unplugged PDB into another CDB using Oracle Enterprise Manager.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Close and open PDBs
tutorials.description: How to administer PDBs in a CDB from Oracle Enterprise Manager.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to common problems and directions for receiving live help
